skills.label: cpp
skills.title: C++: Programming Language
skills.subtitle: High Performance and Interoperability
skills.description: I use C++ to develop high-performance libraries and APIs, especially when optimizing algorithms and enabling interoperability with other languages like Python. Ideal for computationally intensive tasks and low-level system design.

skills.label: python
skills.title: Python: Programming Language
skills.subtitle: Data Science and Machine Learning
skills.description: I use Python to build data pipelines, develop machine learning models, and automate data-driven processes.

skills.label: tensorflow
skills.title: TensorFlow: Deep Learning Framework
skills.subtitle: Neural Network Modeling
skills.description: I use TensorFlow to build and train deep learning models. It supports tasks like time series forecasting, data generation, and AI experimentation through sequential and generative architectures.

skills.label: nodejs
skills.title: NodeJS: Backend Runtime Environment
skills.subtitle: Server-Side Development
skills.description: I use NodeJS to build fast and scalable backend services. It enables the creation of RESTful APIs, real-time applications with WebSockets, and efficient data handling with databases.

skills.label: javascript
skills.title: Javascript: Programming Language
skills.subtitle: Dynamic Behavior and Frontend Logic
skills.description: I use JavaScript to add interactivity to web pages, trigger events, and display analysis results dynamically. It complements HTML and CSS in frontend workflows, especially in building data-driven visual interfaces.

skills.label: typescript
skills.title: TypeScript: Typed JavaScript Superset
skills.subtitle: Strong Typing and Code Reliability
skills.description: I use TypeScript to add static typing and better tooling to JavaScript projects. It improves code reliability, maintainability, and scalability by preventing common runtime errors.

skills.label: react
skills.title: React: UI 'Framework'
skills.subtitle: Web user interface
skills.description: I use React to build dynamic and reusable user interfaces by composing components. It simplifies state management, enables efficient updates, and supports building scalable single-page applications.

skills.label: tailwind
skills.title: Tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework
skills.subtitle: Fast development of modern websites
skills.description: I use Tailwind to style web applications quickly with utility classes. It speeds up development, ensures responsive design, and allows creating modern layouts without leaving the HTML structure.

skills.label: bash
skills.title: Bash: Build Automation Tool
skills.subtitle: Automates Compilation and Workflow Tasks
skills.description: I use Bash in the Linux terminal to automate tasks, manage workflows, and write scripts for compilation, testing, and system management. It is an essential tool for efficient development and everyday operations in a Linux environment.

skills.label: git
skills.title: Git: Version Control System
skills.subtitle: Code Management and Collaboration
skills.description: I use Git to track changes, manage branches, and collaborate on code efficiently. Most of my projects are versioned and maintained through Git, often integrated with GitHub for remote repository hosting and CI/CD workflows.

skills.label: docker
skills.title: Docker: Containerization Platform
skills.subtitle: Environment Automation and Portability
skills.description: I use Docker to containerize applications and ensure consistent environments across development and production. With Docker Compose, I orchestrate multi-container setups for projects involving databases, APIs, and data pipelines.

skills.label: mysql
skills.title: MySQL: Relational Database
skills.subtitle: Ideal for Web and Lightweight Applications
skills.description: I use MySQL to design and manage relational databases, especially in projects with frontend integration. It’s effective for creating normalized schemas using tools like MySQL Workbench and suits small to medium-scale applications.

skills.label: postgres
skills.title: PostgreSQL: Relational Database
skills.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Data Management
skills.description: PostgreSQL is my go-to choice for scalable and robust database solutions. I use it in production-ready environments, often in Docker-based setups, due to its reliability, advanced features, and strong SQL compliance.

skills.label: influxdb
skills.title: InfluxDB: Time Series Database
skills.subtitle: Real-Time Data Monitoring
skills.description: I use InfluxDB to store and query time series data efficiently, especially for system and application monitoring. It’s a NoSQL database optimized for time-stamped data and integrates well with tools like Grafana.

skills.label: grafana
skills.title: Grafana: Data Visualization Platform
skills.subtitle: Observability and AI Monitoring
skills.description: Grafana is my main tool for creating interactive dashboards to visualize time series, system metrics, and AI results. I use it in MLOps pipelines to track model performance and infrastructure behavior in real time.
